name: ROMM
description: ROMM is a beautiful, powerful, self-hosted ROM manager for organizing and managing your gaming ROMs. Features include scanning and organizing ROMs, metadata fetching, artwork management, and RetroAchievements integration for validating game hashes.

notes.text: ROMM may take a few minutes to fully start after installation. Please be patient.
Store your ROM files in /opt/romm_storage/library for ROMM to scan them.
RAHasher is included for RetroAchievements hash validation.
